mapper.update: update teacher set teacherName = #{teacherName}, academyId = #{academyId},departmentId = #{departmentId},photo = #{photo},tel = #{tel},email = #{email},content = #{content} where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from teacher where id in(${value})
mapper.select: select t.id as t_id,t.academyId as t_academyId,t.departmentId as t_departmentId,t.teacherName as t_Name,t.photo as t_photo,t.tel as t_tel,t.commentNumber as t_commentNumber,t.email as t_email,t.content as t_content, a.academyName as a_Name,a.id as a_id, d.departmentName as d_Name,d.id as d_id from teacher t,academy a,department d where t.academyId = a.id and t.departmentId = d.id and t.id = #{value}
mapper.update: update teacher set commentNumber = commentNumber + 1 where id = #{id}
